areas/cold-dng.json/name.text: Temple de la Mine de Bergen

maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.orig: Hey, Lea... how is it going?
maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.text: Hé, Lea... Comment ça va de ton côté ?

maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.orig: Ah... I just need a short breather, this dungeon is pretty long, non?
maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.text: Hem... J'ai juste besoin de respirer un peu, ce donjon est assez long, non ?

maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.orig: Btw.... you did see them too, right?
maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.text: D'ailleurs... tu les as vu aussi, oui ?
Je veux dire, ils sont ÉNORMES !

maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.orig: But also quick and twitchy and there are just SOOO MANY OF THEM.
maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.text: Mais ils sont rapides et vifs aussi et il y en a BEAUCOUP TROP !

maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.orig: Yeah, I really don't like bugs. Pardon.
maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.text: Oui, j'aime vraiment pas les insectes. Pardon.

maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.orig: I guess I just felt like talking about it....
maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.text: J'imagine qu'il fallait juste que j'en parle à quelqu'un...

maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.orig: Anyway, those things will not stop me. The race is still on!
maps/cold-dng/b1/center.json/entities/36.text: En tout cas, ces trucs ne m'arrêteront pas. La course continue !

maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/42/.orig: Press \i[heat] to switch to \c[3]heat mode\c[0] at any time!
maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/42/.text: Appuyez sur \i[heat] pour passer en \c[3]mode chaud\c[0] à n'importe quel moment !

maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/42/.orig: Press \i[heat] \c[3]again\c[3] to switch back to \c[3]neutral mode\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/42/.text: Appuyez \c[3]encore\c[0] sur \i[heat] pour repasser en \c[3]mode neutre\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.orig: Doing actions in element mode will increase your \c[3]element load\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.text: Faire des actions dans un mode élémentaire va augmenter votre \c[3]charge élément\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.orig: Your \c[3]element load\c[0] is displayed around the element mode symbol.
maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.text: Votre \c[3]charge élément\c[0] est affichée autour du symbole du mode élément.

maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.orig: If your element load fills up, you reach the \c[3]Elemental Overload\c[0], which temporarily blocks the use of \c[3]all element modes\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.text: Si votre charge élément se remplit, vous atteignez la \c[3]Surcharge Élément\c[0], qui va temporairement vous empêcher d'utiliser \c[3]tous les modes élémentaires\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.orig: Your element load will steadily decrease in \c[3]Neutral mode\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.text: Votre charge élément va diminuer progressivement en \c[3]Mode Neutre\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.orig: The best approach to \c[3]quickly decrease\c[0] your load is to \c[3]deal damage\c[0] in \c[3]Neutral Mode\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/b3/room7.json/entities/43/.text: La meilleure approche pour \c[3]réduire rapidement\c[0] votre charge est de \c[3]causer des dégâts\c[0] en \c[3]Mode Neutre\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/b4/room9.json/entities/81/.text: SOUS LES ROCHERS ! DANS LES ŒUFS !
SUR CES SATANÉS PLATEFORMES GELÉES MINUSCULES !

maps/cold-dng/b4/room9.json/entities/81/.orig: WHY WOULD THEY DO THIS TO ME?!
maps/cold-dng/b4/room9.json/entities/81/.text: POURQUOI EST-CE QU'ILS DEVAIENT ME FAIRE ÇA ?!

maps/cold-dng/b4/room9.json/entities/81/.orig: Sacrebleu! This dungeon is the worst.
ANYWAY! Race. Still on. Not gonna give up.
maps/cold-dng/b4/room9.json/entities/81/.text: PEU IMPORTE ! La. course. continue. Je ne vais pas abandonner.

maps/cold-dng/g/center.json/entities/64/.orig:
Good luck, Lea!
I'll be waiting at the end!
maps/cold-dng/g/center.json/entities/64/.text:
Bonne chance, Lea !
Je t'attendrai à la fin du donjon !

maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.orig:
These mountains stood 
for eons, nearly unchanged...
maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.text:
Ces montagnes se tiennent
depuis des éons, impassibles...

maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.orig:
Their frozen crown, 
shimmering in the sun.
maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.text:
Leurs sommets gelés,
brillants au soleil.

maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.orig:
Among these heights and hurdles
you persevered.
maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.text:
À travers ces hauteurs et ces obstacles
vous avez prouvé votre persévérance.

maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.orig:
Wielding the blazing flames, 
you cleaved through ice and stone alike.
maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.text:
Avec ces flammes ardentes
vous avez tranché tant la glace que la roche.

maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.orig:
You, the traveler, 
the envoy of change.
maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.text:
Vous, le voyageur,
L'émissaire du changement.

maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.orig:
Take this Shade 
and continue on your journey.
maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.text:
Prenez ce Symbole
et continuez votre voyage.

maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.orig:
Let your every step
form the path of your growth.
maps/cold-dng/g/expo-space.json/entities.text:
Que chacun de vos pas
dessine le chemin de votre croissance.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Birth of Di'aro
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Naissance de Di'aro

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: It all started when \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], the ethereal god of creation, was born into the emptiness of the void.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Tout a commencé lorsque \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0], le dieu éthéré de la création, est né dans le vide du néant.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.note: this text, and the following ones, are based on database.json/lore/godstories-diaro, except 'the anciens' is now 'we'.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: After pondering for eons in solitude, his desire for company gave birth to the \c[3]Gods of Shape\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Après des éons passés dans la solitude, son désir de compagnie a donné naissance aux \c[3]Dieux des formes\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Di'aro is one of these gods. The God of the \c[3]Square\c[0] and the creator of \c[3]solid surface\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Di'aro est l'un d'entre eux. Le Dieu du \c[3]Carré\c[0] et le créateur des \c[3]surfaces solides\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: The creations of Di'aro
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Les créations de Di'aro

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Di'aro is the creator of \c[3]solid surface\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Di'aro est le créateur des \c[3]surfaces solides\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: His powers could form the most \c[3]majestic mountains\c[0] and \c[3]freeze\c[0] the vastest of seas.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Ses pouvoirs lui permettait de former des \c[3]montagnes majestueuses\c[0] et \c[3]geler\c[0] les mers les plus étendues.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Indeed, his creations are enduring and overwhelming sights to behold, yet motionless and without life.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Effectivement, ses créations étaient imposantes et perduraient longtemps, mais étaient immobiles et sans vie.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Fire and Earth
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Le Feu et la Terre

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: \c[3]E'nel\c[0] is a Goddess of Shape, the mistress of the flame, and creator of the sun.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: \c[3]E'nel\c[0] est une Déesse des Formes, aussi connue comme la dominatrice des flammes et créatrice des soleils.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Yet she was envious of her fellow gods, who created fascinating shapes and worlds full of life and color.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Mais elle était envieuse des autres dieux, qui créaient des formes et des mondes pleins de vies et de couleurs.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: She longed to take part, adding a warming fire to these worlds, yet her flame was too mighty and consumed all in its path.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Elle aurait voulu aider, en réchauffant ces mondes avec un feu doux, mais ses flammes étaient trop ardentes et consumaient tout sur son chemin.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: It was then when \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] had a proposal.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: C'est à ce moment que \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] a fait une proposition.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: He shaped a sphere with an empty core and several holes surrounded by high mountains.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Il créa une sphère avec un cœur vide et plusieurs trous entourés par des montagnes.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: E'nel filled this shape with her flame, creating a world with a heated core and life on its surface.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: E'nel rempli cette forme avec sa flamme, créant un monde avec un cœur chaud et de la vie à sa surface.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Today, every \c[3]volcano\c[0] is a record of \c[3]E'nel\c[0] and \c[3]Di'aro\c[0] working in union.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Aujourd'hui, chaque \c[3]volcan\c[0] est un souvenir du travail d'équipe de \c[3]E'nel\c[0] et \c[3]Di'aro\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: The Message of the Sky
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Le Message venu du Ciel

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Life on \c[3]Shadoon\c[0] has prospered and \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] felt that our kind was ready to start our journey.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: La vie sur \c[3]Shadoon\c[0] a prospéré et \c[3]Di'orbis\c[0] eu l'impression que notre espèce était prête pour commencer notre voyage.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Di'aro, however, did not agree. He still saw our kind as infants crawling over the majestic surface he created.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Di'aro n'était pas d'accord avec eux. Il nous voyait encore comme des enfants, qui fourmillaient sur la surface de ses créations grandioses.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Di'orbis then pointed to Shadoon and asked Di'aro to watch. Di'aro saw how our kind climbed the \c[3]highest of mountains\c[0] and reached the very \c[3]bottom of the sea\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Di'orbis pointa alors \c[3]Shadoon\c[0] du doigt et demanda à Di'aro d'observer. Di'aro vit comment notre espèce gravit les \c[3]montagnes les plus hautes\c[0] et attégnit le \c[3]fond de l'océan\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Di'aro was shocked yet proud of our achievements. Reluctantly, he agreed that indeed we had been ready to start our journey.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Di'aro était choqué mais, en réalité, fiers de nos exploits. Bien que rétif, il accepta quand même l'idée que nous étions près pour démarrer notre voyage.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Di'aro then prepared an \c[3]envelope\c[0] of solid rock and ice, used to send the \c[3]Message of the Sky\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Di'aro prépara une \c[3]enveloppe\c[0] de roche solide et de glace, utilisé pour envoyer le \c[3]Message venu du ciel\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: That was rough...
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: C'était dur...

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Too many chasms, right?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Trop de précipices, c'est ça ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: That whole dungeon was one large abyss!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Le donjon entier était un large précipice !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: The last boss was over a cliff for Pete's sake!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Le dernier boss était directement au-dessus d'un abysse, nom de dieu !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Still, you made it.\. I'm so proud of you!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Pourtant, tu y es arrivé.\. Je suis vraiment fier de toi !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Gee, thanks.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Oui... merci.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: So...\. Let's collect the shade already.\. We clearly earned it!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Donc...\. Allons récupérer le symbole maintenant.\. On l'a bien mérité !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Are you kidding?!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Tu plaisantes ?!

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: They will probably do that "float in space" thing again!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Ils vont encore nous faire le coup de la flottaison dans l'espace !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: I can't take that right now, please!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: J'en peux plus, ils vont finir de m'achever avec ça !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Oh, come on!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Oh, aller !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Awww... you're first.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Ohhh... T'es arrivée la première.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: You got me this time.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Cette fois tu m'as eu.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: I blame those bugs, oui!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Ces insectes sont responsables, oui !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Also I'm sure we both can agree that you being \c[1]over-powered\c[0] certainly made a difference.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Et bon, tu es \c[1]trop surpuissante\c[0] aussi. Je suis sûr que ça a dû jouer...

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Seriously, what was up with that battle for the master key?!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Mais sérieusement, c'était quoi ce combat pour avoir le sésame ?!

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: It's like they designed this dungeon after my worst nightmares!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: C'est comme s'ils avaient conçu ce donjon à partir de mes pires cauchemars !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Oh well!\. I'll get you next time!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Mais bon !\. La prochaine fois, je t'aurais !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: ...Ha!\. First again!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: ...Ha !\. Encore première !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Guess being \c[1]over-powered\c[0] doesn't help you much with those puzzles, oui?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: J'imagine que d'être \c[1]surpuissante\c[0] ne t'a pas tellement aidé à résoudre les puzzles, hein ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Phew... to be honest, it was very close.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Pfiou... pour être honnête, c'était très tendu.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: That dungeon was much longer compared to Newcomer's Bridge, non?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Ce donjon était bien plus long comparé à celui du Pont des Nouveaux Arrivants, non ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Hm, but this room is strange, non?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Mmm, mais cette salle est étrange, non ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: I didn't expect to see other players within the dungeon.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Je ne m'attendais pas à voir d'autres joueurs à l'intérieur du donjon.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: I guess rooms like these are simply not instanced.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: J'imagine que les salles comme celle-là ne sont tout simplement pas instanciées.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Anyway, I think we should check out this statue up there.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: En tout cas, je pense qu'il faut qu'on regarde cette statue là-bas.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: ...Bird people. Bird people in space.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: ... Des hommes-oiseaux. Des hommes-oiseaux dans l'espace.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: So that's the Ancients?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Donc c'est ça les Anciens ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: [nods]
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Fair enough.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Bon d'accord.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Alors... do you see those \c[3]rotating info thingies\c[0]?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Alors... tu vois ces \c[3]trucs d'info qui tournent\c[0] ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: I bet those have all the info about the Ancients we need.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Je parie qu'ils ont toutes les informations sur les Anciens dont on a besoin.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Don't forget about the \c[3]quiz\c[0]...
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Pense au \c[3]quiz\c[0]...

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Read about the Ancients in the \c[3]Temple Mine\c[0] and take the quiz at the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0].
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Lisez les informations sur les Anciens dans le \c[3]\v[area.cold-dng.name]\c[0] et faites le quiz au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0].

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Alright! Just read everything there is.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: C'est bon ! Je viens de finir tout ce qu'il y avait à lire.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: We should head back to the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0] and take that quiz!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: On devrait revenir au \c[3]QG des Premiers Érudits\c[0] et faire le quiz !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Water. Frozen water.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: De l'eau. De l'eau gelée.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Solid as rock, smooth as silk.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Dur comme de la roche, lisse comme de la soie.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: ...And slippery.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: ...Et glissant.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: ...Waaay too slippery!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: ...Beaucoup trop glissant !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: And, did you find all the chests already?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Et, tu as déjà trouvé tous les coffres ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: No, still missing one.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Non, il m'en manque un.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Yeah, me too. Somebody gave me a hint, though.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Oui, moi aussi. Quelqu'un m'a donné un indice par contre.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: There is one chest that will only appear if you do certain things in that room.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Il y a un coffre qui n'apparait que si on fait un certain truc dans une salle.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: What kind of things?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Quel genre de trucs ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Dunno. That's all she told me. She didn't want to "spoil" the whole secret.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: J'en sais rien. C'est tout ce qu'elle m'a dit. Elle ne voulait pas me gâcher la surprise.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Meh.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Meh.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Alright! Second boss defeated. What did you think?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Bon ! Second boss battu. Votre avis dessus ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Huge. Pretty slow, though. But I loved the bomb punching!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Énorme. Mais très lent. Mais j'ai adoré le lancer de bombe !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: You know you can throw balls at the bombs, right?
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Tu sais que tu peux lancer des boules sur les bombes, hein ?

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: I don't throw balls. I punch with an extension of my fist.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Je ne lance pas des boules. Je cogne avec une extension de mon poing !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Sure, whatever you want to call it.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Oui, peu importe comment tu appelles ça.

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: And I cut things with swords!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Et je tranche des trucs avec des épées !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: I like swords!
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: J'aime les épées !

maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.orig: Yes... Yes you do.
maps/cold-dng/g/shade-room.json/entities.text: Oui... Oui ça tu les aimes.
